name: Bash
description: Bash the enemy with your weapon, dealing 33% damage. After bashing enemies 4 times, your next Bash will Stun for 1.25 seconds.

enhancements.name: Enhanced Bash
enhancements.description: Damaging a Stunned enemy with Bash generates 3 additional Fury.

enhancements.name: Battle Bash
enhancements.description: Damaging a Stunned enemy with Bash grants you 20% increased damage for 5 seconds.

enhancements.name: Combat Bash
enhancements.description: After critically striking 4 times with Bash, your next Core or Weapon Mastery Skill will Overpower.

name: Hammer of the Ancients
description: Slam your hammer down with the fury of the Ancients, dealing 60% damage to a concentrated area.

enhancements.name: Enhanced Hammer of the Ancients
enhancements.description: Gain 1% increased Critical Strike Chance per point of Fury spent on Hammer of the Ancients, up to 10%.

enhancements.name: Furious Hammer of the Ancients
enhancements.description: Hammer of the Ancients deals 10% increased damage for each 5 Fury it costs.

enhancements.name: Violent Hammer of the Ancients
enhancements.description: When Hammer of the Ancients Overpowers, the Overpowered damage dealt is increased by 30% and enemies are Stunned for 2 seconds.

name: Wrath of the Berserker
description: Explode into a rage, granting Berserking and Unstoppable for 5 seconds. For the next 10 seconds, dealing direct damage with Basic Skills grants Berserking for 5 seconds.

enhancements.name: Prime Wrath of the Berserker
enhancements.description: While Wrath of the Berserker is active, every 50 Fury spent increases Berserk's duration by 1 second.

enhancements.name: Supreme Wrath of the Berserker
enhancements.description: While Wrath of the Berserker is active, every 25 Fury spent increases the damage bonus of Berserk by 3%.

name: Claw
description: Shapeshift into a Werewolf and claw at an enemy for 28% damage.

enhancements.name: Enhanced Claw
enhancements.description: Claw's Attack Speed is increased by 10%.

enhancements.name: Fierce Claw
enhancements.description: Claw's damage is increased by 20% against Poisoned enemies.

enhancements.name: Wild Claw
enhancements.description: Claw applies 2% Poisoning for 6 seconds.

name: Pulverize
description: Shapeshift into a Werebear and slam the ground, dealing 70% damage to surrounding enemies.

enhancements.name: Enhanced Pulverize
enhancements.description: Your next Pulverize will Overpower every 12 seconds while you remain Healthy.

enhancements.name: Primal Pulverize
enhancements.description: Pulverize's damage is increased by 50% against Stunned, Immobilized, or Knocked Back enemies.

enhancements.name: Raging Pulverize
enhancements.description: Your next Pulverize deals 30% increased damage and heals you for 2% of your Maximum Life if an enemy is killed with Pulverize.

name: Bone Spear
description: Conjure a bone spear from the ground, dealing 85% damage and piercing through enemies.

enhancements.name: Enhanced Bone Spear
enhancements.description: Bone Spear makes the first enemy hit Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

enhancements.name: Paranormal Bone Spear
enhancements.description: Bone Spear has a 5% increased Critical Strike Chance. If Bone Spear's primary projectile Critically Strikes, it fires 2 additional bone shards upon impact.

enhancements.name: Supernatural Bone Spear
enhancements.description: Bone Spear breaks into 3 shards when it is destroyed, dealing 25% reduced damage.

name: Army of the Dead
description: Call forth the deep buried dead. Volatile Skeletons emerge over the next 7 seconds that explode when around enemies, dealing 30% damage.

enhancements.name: Prime Army of the Dead
enhancements.description: Army of the Dead also summons an additional skeleton that Taunts and hits enemies for 2 seconds.

enhancements.name: Supreme Army of the Dead
enhancements.description: Your Army of the Dead Skeletons leave behind desecrated ground that deals 20% Shadow damage over 7 seconds.

name: Puncture
description: Throw blades a short distance, dealing 21% damage. Every 3rd cast Slows enemies by 20% for 2 seconds.

enhancements.name: Enhanced Puncture
enhancements.description: Gain 2 Energy per enemy hit by Puncture.

enhancements.name: Fundamental Puncture
enhancements.description: Puncture has a 30% chance to make enemies Vulnerable for 2 seconds.

enhancements.name: Primary Puncture
enhancements.description: Every 3rd cast of Puncture will also ricochet to an additional enemy.

name: Twisting Blades
description: Impale an enemy with your blades, dealing 57% damage and making them take 8% increased damage from you while impaled. After 1.5 seconds the blades return to you, piercing enemies for 70% damage.

enhancements.name: Enhanced Twisting Blades
enhancements.description: Twisting Blades deals 30% increased damage when returning.

enhancements.name: Advanced Twisting Blades
enhancements.description: When your Twisting Blades return to you, your active Cooldowns are reduced by 0.25 seconds per enemy they passed through, up to 3 seconds.

enhancements.name: Improved Twisting Blades
enhancements.description: Enemies are Dazed while impaled with Twisting Blades.

name: Fire Bolt
description: Hurl a flaming bolt, dealing 10% damage and Burning for 40% over 8 seconds.

enhancements.name: Enhanced Fire Bolt
enhancements.description: Fire Bolt pierces through Burning enemies.

enhancements.name: Flickering Fire Bolt
enhancements.description: Fire Bolt generates 2 Mana when hitting a Burning enemy.

enhancements.name: Glinting Fire Bolt
enhancements.description: Critical Strikes with Fire Bolt increase the Burning damage you deal to the enemy by 20% for 4 seconds.

name: Fireball
description: Hurl a ball of fire, dealing 60% damage to surrounding enemies.

enhancements.name: Enhanced Fireball
enhancements.description: Fireball's radius is increased by 50%.

enhancements.name: Greater Fireball
enhancements.description: Fireballs that hit at least 3 enemies explode, dealing 50% increased damage.

enhancements.name: Destructive Fireball
enhancements.description: Your Burning enemies take 10% increased Burning damage per second from you, up to 50%.

name: Sacred Wrath
description: Channel holy energy that pulses forward, dealing 45% damage per pulse to all enemies in its path.

enhancements.name: Enhanced Sacred Wrath
enhancements.description: Sacred Wrath increases your damage by 2% per enemy hit, up to 10%.

enhancements.name: Holy Sacred Wrath
enhancements.description: Each pulse of Sacred Wrath has a 15% chance to make enemies Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

enhancements.name: Divine Sacred Wrath
enhancements.description: Enemies hit by Sacred Wrath have a 30% chance to drop a health globe.

name: Touch of Death
description: Strike enemies with deadly precision, dealing 75% damage and applying a Mark. Marked enemies take 15% increased damage from you.

enhancements.name: Enhanced Touch of Death
enhancements.description: Touch of Death's Mark lasts 5 seconds longer.

enhancements.name: Vicious Touch of Death
enhancements.description: Enemies killed while Marked explode, dealing 50% of the damage to nearby enemies.

enhancements.name: Lethal Touch of Death
enhancements.description: Touch of Death has a 25% increased Critical Strike Chance against Marked enemies.
